select proj_id, mem_code, proj_name, proj_strt_date, proj_end_date, proj_smry, proj_opn_whth, proj_creatn_date, proj_img_route, delete_whth from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_board pk_board) */ rownum rn, proj_id, mem_code, proj_name, proj_strt_date, proj_end_date, proj_smry, proj_opn_whth, proj_creatn_date, proj_img_route, delete_whth from proj where
proj_id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
proj_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
